citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:15am on
07-FEB-17.
Knocked on the door and spoke to an individual who said the licensee was not home and would not be home until
around 5pm.
